actions.committee: Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to limit Federal emergency economic assistance payments to certain recipients.

summary.text: Limits to $150 billion in the aggregate all payments to any person (including affiliates) under the Troubled Asset Relief Program (TARP) under the Emergency Economic Assistance Act of 2008 (EESA) or any other federal emergency economic assistance program.

titles.title: A bill to limit Federal emergency economic assistance payments to certain recipients.
